## TeamsAppManifest class

manifest definition according to : https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/json-schemas/teams/v1.8/MicrosoftTeams.schema.json

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class TeamsAppManifest 
```

|  [accentColor](./teamsfx-api.teamsappmanifest.accentcolor.md) |  | string | A color to use in conjunction with the icon. The value must be a valid HTML color code starting with '\#', for example <code>#4464ee</code>. |

|  [composeExtensions?](./teamsfx-api.teamsappmanifest.composeextensions.md) |  | [IComposeExtension](./teamsfx-api.icomposeextension.md)<!-- -->\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> The set of compose extensions for this app. Currently only one compose extension per app is supported. |
|  [configurableTabs?](./teamsfx-api.teamsappmanifest.configurabletabs.md) |  | [IConfigurableTab](./teamsfx-api.iconfigurabletab.md)<!-- -->\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> These are tabs users can optionally add to their channels and 1:1 or group chats and require extra configuration before they are added. Configurable tabs are not supported in the personal scope. Currently only one configurable tab per app is supported. |
|  [connectors?](./teamsfx-api.teamsappmanifest.connectors.md) |  | [IConnector](./teamsfx-api.iconnector.md)<!-- -->\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> The set of Office365 connectors for this app. Currently only one connector per app is supported. |

|  [icons](./teamsfx-api.teamsappmanifest.icons.md) |  | [IIcons](./teamsfx-api.iicons.md) |  |
|  [id](./teamsfx-api.teamsappmanifest.id.md) |  | string | A unique identifier for this app. This id must be a GUID. |
|  [isFullScreen?](./teamsfx-api.teamsappmanifest.isfullscreen.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> A value indicating whether a personal app is rendered without a tab header-bar |
|  [localizationInfo?](./teamsfx-api.teamsappmanifest.localizationinfo.md) |  | [ILocalizationInfo](./teamsfx-api.ilocalizationinfo.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [manifestVersion](./teamsfx-api.teamsappmanifest.manifestversion.md) |  | string | The version of the schema this manifest is using. |

|  [packageName?](./teamsfx-api.teamsappmanifest.packagename.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A unique identifier for this app in reverse domain notation. E.g: com.example.myapp |
|  [permissions?](./teamsfx-api.teamsappmanifest.permissions.md) |  | ("identity" \| "messageTeamMembers")\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Specifies the permissions the app requests from users. |
|  [showLoadingIndicator?](./teamsfx-api.teamsappmanifest.showloadingindicator.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> A value indicating whether or not show loading indicator when app/tab is loading |
|  [staticTabs?](./teamsfx-api.teamsappmanifest.statictabs.md) |  | [IStaticTab](./teamsfx-api.istatictab.md)<!-- -->\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> A set of tabs that may be 'pinned' by default, without the user adding them manually. Static tabs declared in personal scope are always pinned to the app's personal experience. Static tabs do not currently support the 'teams' scope. |
|  [validDomains?](./teamsfx-api.teamsappmanifest.validdomains.md) |  | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> A list of valid domains from which the tabs expect to load any content. Domain listings can include wildcards, for example <code>*.example.com</code>. If your tab configuration or content UI needs to navigate to any other domain besides the one use for tab configuration, that domain must be specified here. |
|  [version](./teamsfx-api.teamsappmanifest.version.md) |  | string | The version of the app. Changes to your manifest should cause a version change. This version string must follow the semver standard (http://semver.org). |
|  [webApplicationInfo?](./teamsfx-api.teamsappmanifest.webapplicationinfo.md) |  | [IWebApplicationInfo](./teamsfx-api.iwebapplicationinfo.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Specify your AAD App ID and Graph information to help users seamlessly sign into your AAD app. |
